info: <@%s> To receive info about Hive account, just type in `%s(username)`.
systemError: <@%s> :scream: Oh My God, Bot has Found New Bug. Can you please try again after sometimes, I will be Call @Admin for fix this.
accountNotFound: <@%s> We couldn't find specified account at Hive platform, do you put the right username?
accountInfo:
<@%s> Account Info
	Username: @%s
	Reputation: %s
	Effective Power: %s
	Details Power: %s + %s - %s
	Voting Power: %s%%
	Last Voted Time: %s
	Hive: %s
	HBD: %s
	Account Age: %s.
	Provider-@pakgamer
